duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and develop the global product team for continued growth and development of the brand’s global platforms.
Establish leading agile processes to create department efficiencies and implement core eCommerce strategies for all features, functions, and improvements.
Gather ideas and requirements from customers and partners across teams to define market opportunities and customer expectations.
Create clear cases, including return on investment, for new features or supporting tools.
Collaborate with the Project Management Team to sponsor new projects throughout the development lifecycle and coordinate with the Business Systems Analysts to develop relevant documents.
Monitor and identify customer needs, staying current on industry standards/trends and respond by adjusting user experience and product roadmaps.
Lead product discovery, define analytics to be collected regarding the product, and be responsible for iteratively improving the digital model and architecture.
Maintain and document technical processes and automation procedures, understand the ins and outs of complex technology environments, and optimize solutions for efficiency and simplicity.
Explore and transition to a headless environment to improve the digital experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business or a related field (or equivalent professional experience). Master’s degree preferred.
